snippet: A Senate committee and an outspoken U.S. Congressman are seeking further information about a deal under which a top National Security Agency official is being permitted to work part-time for a private company run by the spy agency's former directo...

headline.print_headline: U.S. Congress Examining Deal Between NSA Official, Ex-Agency Chief
headline.main: U.S. Congress Examining Deal Between NSA Official, Ex-Agency Chief

lead_paragraph: A Senate committee and an outspoken U.S. Congressman are seeking further information about a deal under which a top National Security Agency official is being permitted to work part-time for a private company run by the spy agency's former director.
